nodes.text: A starship with a crew of at least one was owned by a Human male scoundrel. The scoundrel lost the starship to an Ithorian and a Baragwin in a game of holochess.

The starship was first mentioned in the attribution of an image drawn by Chris Trevas in the 2009 book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The scoundrel was an in-universe self-portrait of Trevas. The book's editor, Erich Schoeneweiss, came up with the idea of having the Human lose his starship as a joke on Trevas. The image was used to illustrate the varying spacefaring species. The 2009 Scavenger's Guide to Droids sourcebook pictured the Human scoundrel flying a starship, but it is not stated that this is the starship described in this article.
